title: Need help understanding my LP
body:
I was told that my LP are tanked i'm not sure what this means.
I get 12 -  14 LP for a win and lose 23 - 24 when I lose. 
How do I turn this around.
PLEASE HELP.

replies.body: Kind of having the same problem I was told I had to win like 12games in a row. Im lucky to win 3 in a row.
12 games not even pro's win 12 strait. Is there any truth to this.
HOW THE FUCK DO I FIX THIS ???????????????????????
